entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
